821695df-4a5b-474a-9c9d-9433045871f8.description: Track & Trace Services Administrator Certification attests that a badge holder has a working knowledge of the TraceLink Track & Trace Services product and can successfully administer the application for their organization. The certification is valid for two years, and requires a full recertification upon expiration.
821695df-4a5b-474a-9c9d-9433045871f8.name: Track & Trace Services Certified Administrator

badge_template_activities.title: Students must complete a two hour self-study prerequisite and must fully participate in a three-day virtual, or two-day onsite course that prepares learners to administer the TraceLink Track & Trace Services system for their companies. During this course, students configure their personal, custom lab environment.
Students must successfully pass a written examination.

e4aeeb7c-8320-42d5-99e1-26cf1cb13de4.description: An official DSCSA specialist is a TraceLink employee or TraceLink Partner who has completed all relevant training and is now knowledgeable about use and support of the TraceLink DSCSA modules as expected from their role in their corresponding department. The badge holder demonstrates expertise in the DSCSA regulation as well as TraceLink serialization and DSCSA modules, and how these work together to keep stakeholders in compliance.
e4aeeb7c-8320-42d5-99e1-26cf1cb13de4.name: DSCSA Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Specialists must complete all assigned courses in the learning management system, pass a written test and successfully be reviewed by a panel of relevant specialists.

04ccf7db-780e-4d2d-92b2-bfa943801787.description: An official EU Compliance specialist is a TraceLink employee or TraceLink Partner who has completed all relevant training and is now knowledgeable about use and support of the TraceLink EU Compliance module as expected from their role in their corresponding department. The badge holder demonstrates expertise in the EU FMD regulation as well as TraceLink serialization and EU Compliance module, and how these work together to keep stakeholders in compliance.
04ccf7db-780e-4d2d-92b2-bfa943801787.name: EU Compliance Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Specialists must complete all assigned courses in the learning management system, pass a written test and successfully be reviewed by a panel of relevant specialists.

ef2ddd23-10fc-4cea-af86-70de83ecca18.description: An official Saudi Arabia Compliance specialist is a TraceLink employee or TraceLink Partner who has completed all relevant training and is now knowledgeable about use and support of the TraceLink Saudi Arabia modules as expected from their role in their corresponding department. The badge holder demonstrates expertise in the Saudi Arabia regulation as well as TraceLink serialization and Saudi Arabia modules, and how these work together to keep stakeholders in compliance.
ef2ddd23-10fc-4cea-af86-70de83ecca18.name: Saudi Arabia Compliance Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Specialists must complete all assigned courses in the learning management system, pass a written test and successfully be reviewed by a panel of relevant specialists.

34c58cac-3831-49bf-bfaa-a0e3a2d1e2dc.description: An official Russia Compliance specialist is a TraceLink employee or TraceLink Partner who has completed all relevant training and is now knowledgeable about use and support of the TraceLink Russia Compliance and Crypto modules as expected from their role in their corresponding department. The badge holder demonstrates expertise in the Russian regulation as well as TraceLink serialization and RU modules, and how these work together to keep stakeholders in compliance.
34c58cac-3831-49bf-bfaa-a0e3a2d1e2dc.name: Russia Compliance Specialist
